title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7844.1 - Initial scoping meeting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7844.1 - Initial scoping meeting

State Regulations

The board shall meet to examine current energy issues, including issues identified in the previous planning proceeding which continue
to be of importance in the State, as well as any new issues which have
developed since the previous planning proceeding or which are presently
developing. The board shall develop a draft Scope that includes a statement of
issues and policies that the board proposes to address. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7844.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
